alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Orange; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 3:20PM EST until February 17 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Orange, Western Rutland, Eastern Rutland, Western Windsor and Eastern Windsor Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM EST Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will mainly be rain, with pockets of freezing rain and sleet likely early Friday morning. Precipitation will end as a period of snow during the midday to early afternoon hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Orange; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
